get.summary: Retrieves all plugins that fulfill certain conditions. If no conditions are provided, all plugins are returned.

parameters.name: pluginType
parameters.description: (filter) The type of the plugins to be retrieved. Must be one of the PluginTypeEnums. This parameter is mandatory if any of the other parameters are not null.

parameters.name: iacTechnology
parameters.description: (filter) The name of the IaC technology with which the plugins must be compatible. Only for model creation and issue fixing plugins.

parameters.name: complianceRuleId
parameters.description: (filter) The id of the compliance rule with which the plugins must be compatible. Only for compliance checking plugins.

parameters.name: issueType
parameters.description: (filter) The id of the compliance issue with which the plugins must be compatible. Only for issue fixing plugins.

404.description: The compliance rule id or issue id cannot be found.

get.summary: gets a plugin by its identifier
